bibl.title: Variation and Change in Greek and Latin

series.title: Papers and Monographs of the Finnish Institute at Athens

bibl.publisher: Foundation of the Finnish Institute in Athens, Helsinki
bibl.note: Versions of the 10 contributions were initially presented as papers given at Athens in September 2009. - P. i: M.L., H. H.-A. & M.V., Preface; - 1-11: M.L., Introduction: Variation with Multiple Faces.
bibl.seg: Martti Leiwo, Hilla Halla-Aho & Marja Vierros (edd.), Variation and Change in Greek and Latin = Papers and Monographs of the Finnish Institute at Athens. 17.
Helsinki, Foundation of the Finnish Institute in Athens, Helsinki, 2012, 8°, iv-177 pp. ISBN 978-952-67211-4-9. €25.

Versions of the 10 contributions were initially presented as papers given at Athens in September 2009. - P. i: M.L., H. H.-A. & M.V., Preface; - 1-11: M.L., Introduction: Variation with Multiple Faces.
C.R. par Jerker Blomqvist, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2013/2013-05-02.html >. - Emmanuel Dupraz, REA 116 (2014) pp. 247-250. - Bruno Rochette, Tyche 28 (2013) pp. 266-269.
